properties.name: QWERTY keyboard
properties.description: The QWERTY layout is the most widely used keyboard layout in Asia and around the world. Originally designed for English typing, it is familiar to users across various devices and applications. Its arrangement is based on early typewriters, making it universally recognized and accessible, even for typing in languages other than English through language-specific adjustments and software.

properties.name: Phonetic 1.1
properties.description: The Urdu Phonetic 1.1 Layout is a keyboard designed for easy Urdu typing, mapping Urdu letters to similar-sounding English keys. This phonetic approach makes it intuitive for users familiar with QWERTY keyboards.

properties.name: Phonetic 1.0
properties.description: This layout is quite similar to InPage's Urdu phonetic layout, but the placement of some keys is different. And this layout is used especially when we type Urdu documents in software other than InPage. You can easily download and install this layout using the link provided.

properties.name: Arabic (101)
properties.description: The Arabic (101) Layout is a keyboard designed for efficient Arabic typing, with keys strategically mapped to align with traditional Arabic typing standards. This layout is widely used in the Arab world and provides an intuitive typing experience for native speakers and learners alike. It adheres to the structure of Arabic script, ensuring quick access to frequently used letters and symbols, making it a reliable choice for professional and everyday use.
